page.title: 18A SCHOOL DAY
page.content: We catch the school bus at eight-forty and arrive at Spaldwick five minutes later.After register has been taken,we go into the hall for assembly.When it has finished we have our spellings and tables test.We have sets of English cards called S.R.A. and we do a card each week.At ten-forty it is breaktime and the tuckshop is then open.Crisps,and occasionally cakes or apples,are on sale there.Break finishes at eleven o'clock.We then do S.M.P.(Schools Mathematics Project) until lunchtime.We heve a cafeteria with a choice of foods,or the children can bring packed lunches if they wish. At lunchbreak on Friday we have a short disco.We have sports next,either team games or rounders.Afternoon break is at two-fifteen until two-thirty.Records are now taken in.We go home at three-thirty.
